tags: None
review:
The way she explained and examined our new born was good.
Patience enough to listen our queries.
Highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Their care for sanitization of whole clinic area, and Doctors patience to hear you out, then explain the problem in detail is a big plus. Staff is equally polite and ready to help. Their waiting area has sanitized toys which helps in handling the kids. Overall neat and tidy place with less or no disturbance.

tags: None
context: Child specialists ,Nutritional Assessment,People Skills,Paediatric care, Consultation provided for all pediatric disease,
review: *** ** * **** **** ****** *** diagnose the root cause of the disease and treats it accordingly. She is very friendly and a good listener to all the problems the patient is suffering with. With my personal experience she doesn't hesitate to ask questions and also doesn't shy away from answering questions. She gives enough time to the patient and doesn't do the treatment in haste. I would strongly recommend the clinic and the doctor for their good services and proper treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
This is our first visit to Dr. K. Jyothithirmayi with our 2months old baby boy. We liked the way of doctor's treatment to our baby. The explanation of baby caring by doctor was very very good.
We really recommend Dr. K. Jyothirmayi to our known persons.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Nice experienced doctor. We visited the doctor for my 5 yrs child fever n stomach pain. She listened to all our complaints and took friendly counseling to my doctor as per her current lifestyle, which helped me a lot I'm curing her sickness* *** ********* ********** *** **** **** *****

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My elder daughter diagnosed with Covid positive and we took video consultation with madam. Symptomatic treatment has been given with explanation without prescribing unnecessary medicines. Thanks a lot.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Nice doctor and treatment...explaination Is very use ful and had very patience ... recommend,..........................................

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Madam was really sweet and friendly with my 2year old. She understood the problem and did not suggest any unwanted medications. She reviewed the next day also. Answered everything patiently. Thank you Madam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very nice doctor, understanding our problems very clearly, very nice treatment, Friendly behavior with my son, My son is asking for visiting again to Doctor.******* *** ** * **** *************

review: overall good experience. Ambience and proximity was key. Doctor took time explaining the symptoms and treating. It was a good experience overall.
